Text: This is the best translator ever:) and with a lot of dictionary

Thanks, Murlok!

I just tried this. Much better than Firefox's right click word, "search google". This one does it much MUCH quicker with its own local resources. 

Awesome. One of my top favorite useful tool already.

Great upload, I've used the former versions of Babylon as well and I love it. I would buy it if I had the money :( I recommend Babylon to everyone that want a great translator, fast and rich of words, synonyms etc.
